H0.text: when was the jury system abolished in india. 1973

H1.text: when was the jury system abolished in india. 1947

H2.text: when was the jury system abolished in india. 1961

H3.text: when was the jury system abolished in india. 1959

A4.text: jury trials in India were gradually abolished during the 1960s, culminating with the 1973 Criminal Procedure Code

A5.text: The system received no mentions in the 1950 Indian Constitution and went unimplemented in many jurisdictions after independence
